pipdata 0.0.0.9014

    PIP data process Processing Data functions

    Function reference

    All functions

    add_pip_vars()
    Estimate welfare in PPP values (lower level)
    add_pip_vars(<default>)
    default S3 method for add_pip_vars
    adjust_population()
    Adjust microdata to WDI population levels when the number of reporting levels is equal or greater than 2
    dlw_clean()
    Clean data from datalibweb structure (lower level, S2 methods)
    dlw_clean(<pipgd>)
    Clean group data from Datalibweb original file
    dlw_clean(<pipmd>)
    Clean micro data from Datalibweb original file
    get_country_pfw()
    GEt Country Price framework data based on PFW and DLW data info
    get_welfare_ppp()
    Defate welfare variable to PPP values
    pd_add_pip_vars()
    deflate welfare to add_pip_vars (Higher level)
    pd_dlw_clean()
    Clean data from datalibweb structure (High level)
    pd_split_alt_welfare()
    Split data based on alternative welfare
    pd_wbpip_clean()
    Clean data for wbpip compatibility (high level)
    .datatable.aware
    A package for prepare data to be ingested in PIP pipeline
    pipdata_int()
    Get path to pipdata original files
    ppp_to_wide()
    Convert PPP data from pipload to wide format
    process_data()
    PD: process data. Source: datalibweb
    uniq_vars()
    Identify unique variables in data frame
    uniq_vars_to_attr()
    convert variables with unique values along the data set to attrbitus and then remove those unique variables
    uniq_vars_to_list()
    convert variables with unique values along the data set to attrbitus and then remove those unique variables
    update_dlw_inventory()
    Prepare DatalibWeb inventory
    wbpip_clean()
    Clean data to meet wbpip requirements and formats
    wbpip_clean(<pipgd>)
    wbpip_clean method for pipgd class (group data)
    wbpip_clean(<pipmd>)
    wbpip_clean method for pipmd class (microdata)

    Developed by R.Andres Castaneda.
